name: After School
description:
Every evening, as she walks back from school, a Japanese girl
stops at the window of the boy she loves in secret.
But he only has eyes for his books and doesn't notice her.
The girl dreams of the day she will find the strength to talk to him. 

AFTER SCHOOL is a short videogame entirely handpainted on paper, using pencils and watercolors. It's a collaboration between students in Game Art at ECV Bordeaux (backgrounds, characters & animations) and Atelier Sent√¥ (story, music & programming). It was done in 2 days during a masterclass.
